issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

fields.description:
I can't get it to occur on a consistent basis but it's happening more now with iOS 6.1.

[ERROR] :     ** BUILD FAILED **
[ERROR] :     The following build commands failed:
[ERROR] :     	CompileC build/Exam.build/Debug-iphoneos/Exam-universal.build/Objects-normal/armv7/ApplicationRouting.o Classes/ApplicationRouting.m normal armv7 objective-c com.apple.compilers.llvm.clang.1_0.compiler
[ERROR] :     (1 failure)

comments.body:
Hi Tristan,

Can you provide some further information on this issue:

- Titanium SDK version
- XCode version
- Was this building for simulator or device?
- Have you tried building with a default project?
- Does it occur after cleaning the project?

Thanks

We have not heard back from you since you posted the issue. Not sure if this is still throwing error in your app. If so, please send us the requested details so that we can take next necessary step to fix. If we don't hear back, we will assume the issue is no longer valid and close it.
Closing since we have not heard back from the reporter since opening the ticket.
